Articles.Content:
I'm writing this to thank you Felipe personally,

As without this game i wouldn't of found my love of space and physics, because of this i'm focusing my education on maths and physics, hoping for eventually a career within the field.

I have watched this game grow from a fun explosion filled mess, to a complete game with goals and game play, with out losing the fundamental aspect of explosions.

i was here before docking, before eva's, before your had to actually buy the game. 0.14 i think.

I also want to thank every member of Squad for making this game possible.

Edited May 30, 2016 by ArcticVoid

I'd like to add that this game is a real leveller for people everywhere with even a slight interest in space. My dad was an engineer for Rolls Royce years ago (now retired) and this game has him hopping round the room for happiness as often as my 4 year old nephew. Even my grandpa had a good wheeze over it!

You've already made history HarvesteR. Now go make it again
Please keep all discussion in the appropriate thread:
